title: Ep. 247: Lauren Conrad on How to Develop Your Style & Your Career
itunes:title: Ep. 247: Lauren Conrad on How to Develop Your Style & Your Career
itunes:subtitle: It’s been 16 years since Lauren Conrad became a celebrity, and she’s figured out how to build a business and avoid fashion and beauty mishaps under the glare of the spotlight. In this intimate discussion, we talk about her podcast, her new line, Lauren...
description:
It’s been 16 years since Lauren Conrad became a celebrity, and she’s figured out how to build a business and avoid fashion and beauty mishaps under the glare of the spotlight. In this intimate discussion, we talk about her podcast, her new line, Lauren Conrad Beauty, what she’s learned working in fashion—and why winged eyeliner never goes out of style. -- Want more of our beauty podcast? Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
